content.rendered:
After a particle accelerator causes a strange storm, Barry Allen is struck by lightning and falls into a coma. Months later, he wakes up to have super ability, he has become the fastest man in the world. At first, he excitedly tries his newfound talent, then realizes that he’s not the only one with superhuman power and not everyone is making good use of his power. Barry dedicates his life to protecting the innocent.”

Number of seasons: 8 (2014-)

Status: Ongoing

Creators: Greg Berlanti, Geoff Johns, Andrew Kreisberg

Channel: The CW

Starring: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker
